name: webappconfiguration
description: Apply AppSettings and ConnectionStrings from VSTS variables to a webapp
author: Pascal Naber (Xpirit)

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: AzureRM Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure Resource Manager subscription.

inputs.name: WebAppName
inputs.label: Web App Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter or Select the name of an existing AzureRM Web Application.

inputs.name: DeployToSlotFlag
inputs.label: Deploy to Slot
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the option to apply settings to an existing slot other than the Production slot. If this option is not selected, then the settings of the AzureRM Web App will be applied to the Production slot.

inputs.name: ResourceGroupName
inputs.label: Resource Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter or Select the Azure Resource Group that contains the AzureRM Web App specified above.

inputs.name: SlotName
inputs.label: Slot
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter or Select an existing Slot other than the Production slot.

inputs.name: Cleanup
inputs.label: Cleanup WebApp configuration
inputs.helpMarkDown: Overwrites all current settings in Azure
